QuestData.Title: Disclosure
QuestData.Description: Ya doin' well, $n.$b$bYou be provin' dat I got an eye for talent! Now ya see why da Lich King gave me his blessing....$b$bDa time has come for me to reveal my master plan to ya, mon.$b$bNow you be seein' how we gunna sweep through da swarms of Drakkari trolls to take our rightful place in da great palace of Gundrak.$b$bTake dis scepter, mon. It be a token of my trust in ya. With it, you be able ta access my upper chamber and witness for yourself our secret weapons.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drakuru in Voltarus wants you to take the teleporter to his upper chamber.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have ya gone ta witness my creations, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: So, there ya have it, mon.$b$bWe be makin' da ultimate scourge army ta serve da Lich King. He gunna be most pleased!$b$bYou keep da scepter, $n. You gunna be needin' it ta command my army in battle....$b$bSoon!
